title: No FWotD and other rewards
body: I haven't got FWotD nor any kind of game rewards such as key fragments and hextech boxes recently, btw I'm lv20 now so I think FWotD should be activated? Please respond to me, thank you

replies.body: I did see that the last time you had a FWotD mission active was on 11-17, and you did login and play some games after that so I'm not 100% sure why the mission never appeared again. Go ahead and reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our game agents can figure out why those missions aren't showing up and if it's possible to get them retroactively added.

The FWotD bonus was removed when the conversion from IP to BE occurred. 

You only get a Hextech Chest when you or another player receives an S- or better and you can only get a certain amount of Hextech Chests; you can check your profile to see when you get your next Hextech Chest.
First Win of the Day still exists, it's just a mission now instead of being hidden in your profile.
